column1: No one should EVER be denied their constitutional right to practice their beliefs free from government interference and as your voice in Washington I will ALWAYS stand up for the right of ALL Americans to follow their faith.

Our Founding Fathers understood the important role religious freedom would play in America's future. As a nation founded on faith the Founders understood the freedom to peacefully practice your convictions plays a critical role in the well-being of human nature. https://t.co/v1mARfYqql
